bibl.title: Wybory biskupów w Egipcie w V-VII wieku. [The Elections of Bishops in Egypt in the 5th and 7th centuries.] Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Gathers all the available evidence on the elections of bishops in Egypt in the 5th and 7th centuries. No attempt at exhaustive research in this domain has ever been undertaken in the past; many sources have been neglected up to now. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ewa Wipszycka, Wybory biskupów w Egipcie w V-VII wieku. [The Elections of Bishops in Egypt in the 5th and 7th centuries.]
U Schyłku Starożytności. Studia Źródłoznawcze [Late Antiquity. Studies in Source Criticism] 9 (2010) pp. 189-220.

Gathers all the available evidence on the elections of bishops in Egypt in the 5th and 7th centuries. No attempt at exhaustive research in this domain has ever been undertaken in the past; many sources have been neglected up to now. - Avec résumé en anglais.
